item.title: Switching to Hugo
item.description: Regarding the Switch For some apparently reason, I decided to make a switch to Hugo from Jekyll for my Blog. I kind of preferred the look more of Hugo which is why I decided to switch, also I can add comments and stuff. However, I may switch again to my own code from scratch, IF I actually learn web dev and the Spring Framework. If you didn’t know, I host this blog with VSC and Github Pages.

item.title: First Post! (Test)
item.description: Hello there! This is my first blog post, that I’m testing. If you are reading this, happy new years <3
